mapper.select: SELECT member_nm AS name, dept_id AS dept, member_rank AS rank, member_dv AS division, nvl(license_nm,'정처기') AS license FROM member m LEFT JOIN license_mapping lm on m.member_id = lm.member_id LEFT JOIN license l on lm.license_num = l.license_num
SELECT member_id AS id, member_nm AS name, member_email AS email FROM member WHERE member_id = #{id}
